template.description: An executable item that is integrated in the application's navigation menu. Add a listener on `selection` to implement the action
template.name: tabrisAction

template.description: A composite on which graphics can be drawn
template.name: tabrisCanvas

template.description: A widget with a drop-down list of items to choose from
template.name: tabrisCombo

template.description: An empty widget that can contain other widgets
template.name: tabrisComposite

template.description: A widget to display an image
template.name: tabrisImageView

template.description: A scrollable list that display data items, one per row
template.name: tabrisList

template.description: A widget representing a numeric value as a horizontal bar with a growing indicator
template.name: tabrisProgressBar

template.description: A composite that allows its content to overflow either vertically (default) or horizontally.
template.name: tabrisScrollComposite

template.description: A widget representing a numeric value as an movable indicator on a horizontal line.
template.name: tabrisSlider

template.description: A container representing a single tab of the TabFolder widget
template.name: tabrisTab

template.description: A widget that can switch between [tabs](#Tab)
template.name: tabrisTabFolder

template.description: A widget that allows to enter text.
template.name: tabrisText

template.description: A push button that remains pressed
template.name: tabrisToggleButton

template.description: A widget that can display a web page
template.name: tabrisWebView
